field.name: label1
field.content: Send an email notification to all users on a ticket when a user replies to a ticket. Usefull if you want to notify a ticket group, or similar. Note: Handlers are notified using the built in system

field.name: enabled
field.label: Enabled
field.description: Send email to all ticket users when a user replies

field.name: label2

field.name: label1
field.content: Send an email notification to a handler when they are CC'd to a support ticket

field.name: enabled
field.label: Enabled
field.description: Send email to all ticket users when a user replies

field.name: label2
field.content:
The template uses the same tags as the usual ticket email tempaltes.

Example:

Subject:

[{reference}] {subject}

Message:


Dear {to_name},

{ccd_name} has been CC'd to the support ticket by {sender_name}.

Ticket Summary:-

Subject: {subject}
Ticket reference number: {reference}
{if,department}Department: {department}
{endif}{if,category}Category: {category}
{endif}{if,product}Product: {product}
{endif}

You can view the ticket by going to {admin_link}

Thanks,
Support Team
